name: Not Cube But Soup (Patericko)
description:
Not Cube But Soup is a game solely developed by myself, inspired by Brackeys' "How to make a video game" tutorial (link below).

It contains 20 different core levels with speeds increasing as the levels get higher. There is a coin within each stage which if you collect in all stages, it will unlock the final bonus level. The bonus level is much more difficult and challenging - it even took me ages to complete it!

Make sure to share the game and leave any feedback. Feel free to use this game in any video without restrictions. Any donation is appreciated but definitely not required!

Brackeys' Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL

*All music and images used were created by myself
